data.text: ğŸŒˆ You can be yourself at bpostgroup At the beginning of this month, which bears the colours of the rainbow, Anette Bohm, Chief Human Resources Officer at bpostgroup, explains what #Diversity and #Inclusion mean: â€œDiversity is reflected in our 35,000 employees, with more than 100 different nationalities, who bring millions of people together every day. We offer high-quality employment in an inclusive work environment. You can be yourself and fulfil your potential, because it is talent that makes a difference. To create an inclusive culture, everyone must feel they are being supported, listened to and inspired to be the best they can be.â€ It doesn't matter who you are, where you come from and what your abilities are. At bpostgroup, you can be yourself and develop your talents. #wearebpostgroup
